tags: Etherborn fija su lanzamiento para mediados de julio
summary: Etherborn fija su lanzamiento para mediados de julio
title: Etherborn fija su lanzamiento para mediados de julio
body:
Altered Matter ha anunciado una fecha de lanzamiento final para Etherborn, su plataforma de exploración surrealista para mediados de julio de 2019. Etherborn es un salto elegante en el género del rompecabezas de la gravedad. Un juego de plataformas de rompecabezas ambiental basado en la exploración y comprensión de estructuras de desplazamiento por gravedad en niveles […]

La entrada Etherborn fija su lanzamiento para mediados de julio aparece primero en Versus Media México | Videojuegos, Cine, Tecnología, TV, Cultura..


Etherborn fija su lanzamiento para mediados de julio

summary: [North America] Horizon Chase Turbo Switch Physical Edition Announced
title: [North America] Horizon Chase Turbo Switch Physical Edition Announced
body:
[North America] #HorizonChaseTurbo #NintendoSwitch Physical Edition Announced

For those of you in North America, PM Studios and acttil have announced a release date for the physical edition of Horizon Chase Turbo. Gamers will be able to get their hands on Horizon Chase Turbo Switch Physical Edition come July 30th at select retailers.

All first editions of the game will come with a Special Edition box art. An exclusive Thank You card will also come included from the…

tags: Gods and Monsters es el nuevo juego de Ubisoft
summary: Gods and Monsters es el nuevo juego de Ubisoft
title: Gods and Monsters es el nuevo juego de Ubisoft
body:
En el marco de la E3 2019, Ubisof presentó Gods & Monsters, un nuevo título de acción y aventura desarrollado por Ubisoft Quebec. Esta aventura de fantasía de mundo abierto presenta un hermoso estilo de arte pictórico, involucrando a los jugadores en un mundo fantástico mientras utilizan habilidades divinas para derrotar a las famosas bestias […]

La entrada Gods and Monsters es el nuevo juego de Ubisoft aparece primero en Versus Media México | Videojuegos, Cine, Tecnología, TV, Cultura..


Gods and Monsters es el nuevo juego de Ubisoft

summary: Considering Just Dance 2020 is coming to the original Wii and that Persona Q2 was one of the last 3DS games (that we know of) to...
body: Considering Just Dance 2020 is coming to the original Wii and that Persona Q2 was one of the last 3DS games (that we know of) to be released… does this mean the Wii is technically going to outlive the 3DS? That would be insane!

reblog.comment: Considering Just Dance 2020 is coming to the original Wii and that Persona Q2 was one of the last 3DS games (that we know of) to be released… does this mean the Wii is technically going to outlive the 3DS? That would be insane!

summary: Just Dance 2020 Announced, Coming To Switch & Wii But Not Wii U
title: Just Dance 2020 Announced, Coming To Switch & Wii But Not Wii U
body:
#JustDance2020 Announced, Coming To #Switch & #Wii But Not Wii U

It shouldn’t come to a surprise but Just Dance 2020 has been announced for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Wii. The Nintendo Wii U on the other hand, will not be getting its own version. The Just Dance series is celebrating 10 years since it began which, is big enough reason to make a song and dance about it, literally. No really, Ubisoft literally made a song and dance about it during their Ubisoft…

View On WordPress

tags: Trials Rising Season 2: Medieval Motor Mayhem
summary: Trials Rising Season 2: Medieval Motor Mayhem Now Live - Full Details
title: Trials Rising Season 2: Medieval Motor Mayhem Now Live - Full Details
body:
#TrialsRising Season 2: Medieval Motor Mayhem Now Live - Full Details #NintendoSwitch @Ubisoft

The newest season for Trials Rising has been announced by Ubisoft and brings some renaissance flair with it. The Trials Rising Season 2: Medieval Motor Mayhem is now live and will have all new seasonal rewards, new bikes and 5 new medieval themed stages to ride down and make some serious air with.

You can check out the full list of details below for Trials Rising Season 2: Medieval Motor Mayhem a…

View On WordPress
